ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: WoW!  They must have added to the list of stuff you get from that quest, Ive done it probably 100 times and never gotten that. Kitasi ... From: Talies the
ygData.messageBody:
WoW! They must have added to the list of stuff you get from that quest, Ive
done it probably 100 times and never gotten that.

Kitasi

-----Original Message-----
From: Talies the Wanderer [mailto:snicker@...]
Sent: Monday, July 02, 2001 7:19 AM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Wish list...


I have managed to acquire a near-epic item that I cannot use, thanks to an
incredibly random quest (details below). A friend of mine with a
near-uber-guild has offered to trade me "whatever I want" for it, so I'm
trying to come up with stuff that doesn't require me to go to the Planes,
or them to kill a dragon.

Any suggestions?

Talies the Wanderer

<details>
Did the scrap metal quest in Akanon, and recieved The Horn of Hsagra - 13 /
20 piercing, WAR, SHD, ROG, RNG, +35 AC +75 HP and some other assorted
stats. Looked like a rat tooth, so I almost trashed it!!!


Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
